lead_paragraph: Denied another stint as India's head coach, Ravi Shastri has been embroiled in an ugly spat with former captain Sourav Ganguly, who was part of the panel which awarded the job to Anil Kumble last week.

headline.print_headline: Shastri in Spat With Ganguly After India Coaching Snub
headline.main: Shastri in Spat With Ganguly After India Coaching Snub

snippet: Denied another stint as India's head coach, Ravi Shastri has been embroiled in an ugly spat with former captain Sourav Ganguly, who was part of the panel which awarded the job to Anil Kumble last week....
